page.title: 06JANE'S DAY
page.content: After getting dressed,taking me half an hour to decide what to wear,I had my breakfast,did my hair and went to school.It was pouring with rain as usual.School was quite enjoyable but uneventful. After school,I went to my friend's home.We had a great time playing games.Going home though,my bike went funny,I skidded and crashed to the ground.I was badly hurt and covered in mud.A woman was walking by but didn't offer to help so I had to get myself home.When I got home I couldn't eat anything because of the shock.After watching T.V. I was hungry so I fried up a real "slap up" meal.Dad though went nuts with me for eating so late but I gulped it down not taking any notice because it was so delicious !
